statements: SELECT * FROM performance_logs
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM performance_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC
SELECT app_id, COUNT(*) as log_count FROM performance_logs GROUP BY app_id
SELECT * FROM performance_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND log_message LIKE '%error%'
SELECT DISTINCT app_id FROM performance_logs
SELECT * FROM performance_logs WHERE log_id = 1 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_timestamp FROM performance_logs WHERE app_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT app_id, COUNT(*) FROM performance_logs GROUP BY app_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY app_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT app_id FROM performance_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY app_id;
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM performance_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND log_timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM application_logs
SELECT application_name, log_message FROM application_logs WHERE log_id = 1
SELECT log_id, application_name, log_timestamp FROM application_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC
SELECT application_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE application_name = 'example_app' ORDER BY metric_timestamp
SELECT * FROM application_logs WHERE log_id = 1
SELECT application_name, log_timestamp, log_message FROM application_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC
SELECT application_name, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM application_logs GROUP BY application_name
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'CPU Usage' ORDER BY metric_value DESC
SELECT application_name, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_metric_value FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY application_name HAVING AVG(metric_value) > 50
SELECT * FROM application_logs;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM application_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM application_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM application_users WHERE user_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM application_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT log_message FROM application_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM application_users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM application_logs JOIN application_users ON application_logs.log_id = application_users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM app_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT app_id, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM app_metrics WHERE app_id = 1;
SELECT error_message, timestamp FROM error_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT request_method, endpoint, response_code FROM request_logs WHERE response_code = 404 ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity ORDER BY user_id, timestamp;
SELECT * FROM app_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT app_id, SUM(cpu_usage) AS total_cpu_usage FROM app_metrics GROUP BY app_id ORDER BY total_cpu_usage DESC;
SELECT error_message, timestamp FROM error_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT endpoint, COUNT(*) AS total_requests FROM request_logs GROUP BY endpoint HAVING total_requests > 100 ORDER BY total_requests DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM app_users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM app_users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM app_settings WHERE setting_value LIKE '%dark%';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, metric_timestamp FROM app_metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT error_id, error_message, error_time FROM app_errors WHERE error_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM app_users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM app_users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM app_settings ORDER BY setting_name ASC;
SELECT log_message, log_time FROM app_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, metric_timestamp FROM app_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_timestamp ASC;
